ygData.subject: Rude Awakening
ygData.msgSnippet: In outer space, everything naturally happens at once. Stars shed immense amount of energy,  the planets constantly rotate on an axis, and a worm hole opens up.

References: <l03010d09b6d470dd6d53@[204.174.146.18]> <3AAE5763.3330.2FBF02BC@localhost> <00d001c0abd7$f627dda0$b61d4418@...>

Date: Tue, 13 Mar 2001 21:44:17 -0700
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Rude Awakening
From: Jeremiah <rdahl@...>

In outer space, everything naturally happens at once. Stars shed immense
amount of energy,  the planets constantly rotate on an axis, and a worm
hole opens up. But upon closer inspection, the worm hole is neither
natural, or peaceful like its surrounding. A very small interstellar
shuttle emerges from the worm hole, with laser fire on its tail. The
thrusters are burning more than they normally should, for they are damaged,
and the ship starts to careen out of control, towards the third planet from
the power eminating star.

Inside the shuttle three robots run around, but it is to dark to make out
their appearance, the only light, comes from small fires bursting up
everywhere. One of the larger ones stops at a fire, and aims both hands at
it. A swhirl of blue energy builds up, then shoots a beam of liquid
nitrogen at the fire putting it out. Another, very small robot gets into
the control chair, and attempts to steer the ship, "No good, its out of
control" he says. Then the third robot runs over to a consol, "Hey, dont
worry guys, i'll send a distress signal, just close the transwarp portal,
before our friends follow us".  At the calm words of the blue robot at the
consol, the one in the control chair flips a button.

Outside, the worm hole closes up, and all is as it should have been, except
for the small ship, starting to burn as it enters the atmosphere.

Over an old Autobot frequency, and emergency signal begins, "emergency, our
ship is out of control, we will require assistance, and more than likely,
repairs when we crash" and this message plays over loops, as the ship
descends towards Turkey, making a flaming path through the atmosphere on
its descent.
